title: Import from Active Directory: Unable to import from different domain than where the application is installed
author: spanningtrees42
body_snippet:
I have tried using IP of a domain controller and using the FQDN but am still unable import from any domain other than the one where the computer running mRemoteNG is installed.  I'm a domain admin on all the domains I'm needing to import from.  I did try running the app as a different user and importing that way but it launched a new instance of the app so any changes would've been lost when I relaunch using my normal credentials.

Version: 1.77.3
OS: Win 10 Enterprise 22H2

comments.author: Kvarkas
comments.snippet: hello, 1.77.3 nightly have disabled settings saving for a reason, will be unlocked in new release soon

comments.author: spanningtrees42
comments.snippet:

comments.author: robertpopa22
comments.snippet:
Triage refresh (P4 version-label debt): this issue is tagged with legacy version labels. Please retest on the latest build (fork v1.79.x or upstream dev), then share reproducible steps and expected vs actual behavior. If still valid, keep open and relabel to current triage scope (for example Need 2 check). If fixed, close with resolution.

Current legacy version labels: 1.77.3
